name: Avira

visage.txt: Lean and well built, with black hair and ice cold, soul piercing blue eyes, this girl looks like walking razor wire. She has well defined, even sharp face bones and always seems at least a little pissed off

psyche: Quite cheerful and enthusiastic about life, hates herpes
backstory: Born in the late 70's, she witnessed her family die to a fucking aircraft bomb. From this moment on, she never was truly the same person she was before - she became unhinged, happy about anything and everything and everything and anything...

0.name: Cooking
0.description: She got quite good at cooking after spending most of her life alone

1.name: Dancing
1.description: Tried to dance the pain away. Didn't work. But got good at dancing.
